future.title: Top cards on the draw pile

none.title: Special Cards
none.desc: These cards only have an effect in combination with other cards. You cannot play them but you can pass or exchange them by using a Handshake or Illegal Pop-Up Shop respectively.

Nope.title: Nope
Nope.desc: Block an action of another player

Sneeze.title: Sneeze
Sneeze.desc: End your turn, make next player draw an additional card

Skip.title: Skip
Skip.desc: Draw one card less than requested.

Future.title: Future
Future.desc: Peek at the top 3 cards on the draw pile.

Hamster.title: Hamster
Hamster.desc: The turn goes to the player with the fewest cards who's not in Lockdown. This player draws cards until he no longer has the fewest cards.

IllegalPopUpShop.title: Illegal Pop-Up Shop
IllegalPopUpShop.desc: Exchange a card with a card from the discard pile.

Multiply.title: Multiply
Multiply.desc: Make a copy of an own action card.

AmericanHealthcare.title: American Healthcare
AmericanHealthcare.desc: Put all your cards on the discard pile and get a Vaccine.

Lockdown.title: Lockdown
Lockdown.desc: Choose a player who is not allowed to play or draw cards for one round.

Handshake.title: Handshake
Handshake.desc: Ask a card from another player. You get two chances, but if the player has neither, you give him a card of your choice.

InfectedTissue.title: Infected Tissue
InfectedTissue.desc: The player with this card gets Corona when Health Inspection gets drawn.

HealthInspection.title: Health Inspection
HealthInspection.desc: The player with the Infected Tissue gets Corona.

CoronaParty.title: Corona Party
CoronaParty.desc: All players receive a copy of the top card on the draw pile.

Corona.title: Corona
Corona.desc: The player is out of the game unless he has a Vaccine.
